::Zardus/Ramulus::

Zardus enters the conference room, motioning Starscream to follow. Reptilica 
had done his best to clean up the mech fluid, but there was still a good 
amount on the table and walls.

"There was a short battle in here a little while ago," Zardus explains the 
mech fluid, taking the least stained seat.

"Sit down," he says politely to Starscream, "Now what is this about Megatron?"
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Ramulus hears Brix tell him to hurry up, doubling his efforts to put out the 
fire. It was spreading rather rapidly, but he was getting most of it.

With a triumphant-type sound, Ramulus takes a step back.

"All done!" he says, turning around and sitting back down in his seat, 
buckling the various belts, "How's the landing coming?"
